system.description:
Your understanding of your religion’s teachings has reached new depths, strengthening your ability to bring the power of the divine to bear.  You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain an additional specialty with religion, and the maximum size for an expertise die on religion checks for you is 1d10.
  • You gain an additional @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.zezsezm2e0azb3ty]{Empowered Turning} effect.  If you attempt to use channel divinity to turn undead and one or more creatures succeed on the save, you may use your reaction to make a religion check.  You may replace your normal turning DC with the result of the check.
